ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
Collection of decorators and base classes to allow a declarative
style of programming. Excellent for event-loop task registration.
Also included are nesting attribute-access dictionaries (Bunches)
as well as value storage with callbacks. Relatively Magic-Free.
about.summary: Collection of decorators and base classes to allow a declarative style of programming.

about.description:
Collection of decorators and base classes to allow a declarative
style of programming. Excellent for event-loop task registration.
Also included are nesting attribute-access dictionaries (Bunches)
as well as value storage with callbacks. Relatively Magic-Free.
about.summary: Collection of decorators and base classes to allow a declarative style of programming.

name: declarative
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "declarative" %}
{% set version = "1.3.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/mccullerlp/python-declarative/archive/refs/tags/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a7d057a29c4ae97fab85e290eb4abc115e203e0a6f82ff544950956af1187d8a

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - numpy
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - declarative
    - declarative.argparse
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
    - python {{ python_min }}
  source_files:
    - test/
  commands:
    # check requirements
    - python -m pip check
    # run test suite
    - python -m pytest -ra test

about:
  home: https://github.com/mccullerlp/python-declarative
  summary: Collection of decorators and base classes to allow a declarative style of programming.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    Collection of decorators and base classes to allow a declarative
    style of programming. Excellent for event-loop task registration.
    Also included are nesting attribute-access dictionaries (Bunches)
    as well as value storage with callbacks. Relatively Magic-Free.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - mccullerlp
